channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java

item.title: CVE-2022-22533|2024-08-03T03:14:55.480Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20java
item.description: Due to improper error handling in SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java - versions KRNL64NUC 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, KRNL64UC, 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, 7.53, KERNEL 7.22, 7.49, 7.53, an attacker could submit multiple HTTP server requests resulting in errors, such that it consumes the memory buffer. This could result in system shutdown rendering the system unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2022-22532|2024-08-03T03:14:55.440Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20java
item.description: In SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java - versions KRNL64NUC 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, KRNL64UC, 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, 7.53, KERNEL 7.22, 7.49, 7.53, an unauthenticated attacker could submit a crafted HTTP server request which triggers improper shared memory buffer handling. This could allow the malicious payload to be executed and hence execute functions that could be impersonating the victim or even steal the victim's logon session.
